JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description:       Conducts analysis of organizational needs and goals for the development and implementation of application systems    Understand and gather information on existing products, new product roadmap and effectively articulate the product requirements.    Designs software modules that will work together to produce desired product.    Write source code; adapt existing components and unit test developed components.    Ensure that the design meet performance, security, usability and reliability and scalability requirements.    Review, analyze, and modify programming systems, including coding, testing, debugging and installing for a large-scale system. Maintain meticulous records to document program development and revisions.    Maintain current test suites for devices already in production. This work could include, but not limited to fix yield bugs, new features/tests, new HW.    Develop new tests/tools/scripts for unannounced products.    Provision devices in Redmond in lab or on desktop.    Answer provisioning related questions from other groups including the factory.
